item.description: I am currently working at Rescale, Inc. as a Data Engineer. I started programming since high school, and I am proficient in Python, R and SQL and data skills in PySpark, Hive and AWS cloud computing. At Insight Data Science, I developed a few data pipelines to deal with large datasets and heterogeneous data and build the front-end. In the grad school, I built efficient data analysis pipelines and managed 24 graduate and undergraduate students.
